website_summaries.verdict: The story of how one woman used a ketogenic diet to lose 120 pounds with tips on how to do the same.
pros: A ketogenic diet is a high-fat, high-protein, low-carb eating plan, which was originally designed to help children with epilepsy
Suzanne Ryan is a popular blogger who gives Keto Karma talks about the advantages of a low sugar diet
cons: This diet gets some criticism for being too extreme and not allowing for a balanced long-term way of life

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Let Your Wife Buy This...
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this book without me knowing. Now we don’t have any carbs in the house, so I have to constantly lie to her so I can slip away and eat my oatmeal cookies. She’s starting to catch on to my lies and now she thinks I’m seeing another woman. I feel like my marriage is on the fringe. I’d tell her the truth but I feel I’m in too deep now. I love carbs and I also love my wife. I just can’t see a life without both of them together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need to know to be successful at Keto is in this book!
customer_reviews.text: If you not only want to learn about Keto, but be successful at it, you'll want this book. Suzanne's recipes, blog and Instagram (KetoKarma) are what inspired and helped my husband and I to lose a combined 179 pounds in one year. She is so relatable, and her recipes are delicious. This is my favorite Keto book by far and one that I recommend to all of my family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Addition to my Keto Cookbook Library
customer_reviews.text: I've been following Suzanne's amazing personal journey on Keto Karma for a few years now and she is such an inspiration. I love that she's a mom and has really practical advice to give out, but mostly I love her pay-it-forward attitude and kind heart. This book has wonderful content- it is so much more than a cookbook and would be a great starter guide for anyone new to the keto diet. She has done a lot work, including breaking down what to buy at certain stores (Costco, Trader Joe's, Safeway, etc.), and an easy "swap this for that" guide. My entire family eats a keto diet and her recipes are both family and budget friendly. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this book to anyone that is thinking of living ...
customer_reviews.text: A must read. Suzanne explains in her book how to live "for real" a Ketogenic lifestyle. I recommend this book to anyone that is thinking of living this lifestyle. I know for me it change my life. Three years and counting. I am healthy and happy.
customer_reviews.author: ISABEL C REYNA

customer_reviews.title: Keto diet is expensive and labor intensive.
customer_reviews.text: This book will never work for me. The recipes call for a long list of ingredients. Some of them have to be purchased from specialty stores or ordered online, including a long list of artificial sweeteners. They don't list sodium content, they list macros. You are expected to add these up daily. One would have to be well off to afford this lifestyle and have plenty of time to spend cooking and cleaning the kitchen. Guess what they call for you to use as breading? Pork rinds. I'm not putting artificial sweeteners or pork rinds in my body.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Not crazy about the book. A lot of things used seemed to found only on the west coast. Not easy available for out in the middle of nowhere.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hudak

customer_reviews.title: Oh my goodness!  The best Keto book thus far.
customer_reviews.text: ( I am not a paid product reviewer) I have several Keto cookbooks but the others have so many steps or ingredients that I have to make a special trip to purchase. This book is NOW my number one go to. Every recipe I’ve made both my husband and I have enjoyed. So full of flavor. Also, I like that every recipe has a color picture. And in the beginning of the book there is a bunch of basic Keto info for new Keto dieters. And the back of book as a month long meal plan. I plan on starting this 30 day meal plan tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Brady4pac

customer_reviews.title: Best Keto Recipe Book I’ve found!
customer_reviews.text: This recipe book is great! I’m obsessed with the brownie, cheesecake, and peanut butter fat bomb recipes! I’m slowly working my way through the book, but I did find that the waffle recipe was extremely disappointing and I had really high hopes for it. Also, I’d recommended buying the spiral bound version. I started out with the paperback copy and no matter how hard I tried I couldn’t get the book to stay open to a page which was frustrating when I was in the middle of cooking/ baking and trying to read the recipe (usually with hands covered in whatever I was making).
customer_reviews.author: S&V

customer_reviews.title: this is a receipe book
customer_reviews.text: Everything in this book I already knew and all the recipes can be found on line, don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: DMacRizzo

customer_reviews.title: My 2nd favorite keto book
customer_reviews.text: The Keto Diet, by Leanne Vogel, was my first keto book. The Keto Diet is a book that I use on a daily basis and it has grown with me and my keto journey. I am not sure what I was expecting from Simply Keto, maybe additional information or another book like The Keto Diet. Simply Keto is my 2nd favorite keto book right now, but I am not sure I'd buy it again, because The Keto Diet has more information and is easier to navigate - in my opinion. Clearly MANY people love this book and it's a good book... but...
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Recipes are misleading
customer_reviews.text: This book is beautiful but recipes don’t match the pictures. I’ve made three main dishes out of this book and been disappointed all three times because the final product doesn’t look anything close to the picture- I cook a lot and I followed the recipes exactly. Also the serving sizes are misleading- The carb amount listed is OK for a meal but serving sizes are such a small amount of food that you can’t eat a meal and stay below your carb max. It seems intentional so that these recipes can be advertised as keto when really they’re not that keto friendly. Overall I don’t recommend this book.
customer_reviews.author: Snow White

customer_reviews.title: Delicious recipes that are easy to incorporate into everyday life
customer_reviews.text: Delicious recipes that are easy to incorporate into everyday life. Last year I tried Keto with a different cookbook and was immediately discouraged. Ingredients were so obscure and expensive, and the recipes super involved and complicated. THIS cookbook is none of those things - it makes sense out of the Keto way of eating. I highly recommend this book if you are at all interested in Keto. I have had great success with it in the last 3 weeks - a completely different experience than I had with the first attempt last year. I think I have found a new way of life.
customer_reviews.author: CarolineP

customer_reviews.title: Buy This Cookbook
customer_reviews.text: OMG!!! Sooooooooo many good recipes. Easy to follow. Not a ton of crazy ingredients. And what’s most important to me - PICTURES!!!! The recipes are so good my friends don’t even realize they are eating keto. Do yourself a favor and buy this book!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Simply Recipes
customer_reviews.text: Thought I was getting keto knowledge not a ton of recipes then repeats of recipes back and forth. Should have saved my money
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Russell

customer_reviews.title: Good book, wish she had offered microwave cooking option.
customer_reviews.text: I have just started KETO and read many cookbooks. By far this is the best. Suzanne Ryan did an exceptional job on this book. My only complaint would be that she uses the microwave in a lot of recipes, and I do not use microwaves. I wish she had offered a regular oven solution, so will have to figure that out on my own. Everything else is really awesome and VERY detailed. If you are starting KETO this is a really good book.
customer_reviews.author: Schrocked

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the cookbook
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy cooking Keto. I purchased this book at the suggestion of a friend and honestly when i got it and looked through the contents i was not impressed. I mean, basics but nothing you can't find online. I sent it back only because i probably wouldn't have utilized it.
customer_reviews.author: Cari Platt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Book - However, I Have Only One Complaint Which is the Reason I Gave 4 Stars...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this book for a couple weeks now and have prepared several of the recipes and they have all been awesome and I have only one complaint. My reason for the four stars is all the recipes lack one thing, portion size. Although each recipe states the yield, there is no portion/serving size. However, I am using the myfitnesspal to track my food, and every recipe is in the food database and does include serving size. Otherwise I would have given 5+ stars for this cookbook. I highly recommend this if you are considering the Keto eating lifestyle. I hate the work diet as it implies a temporary eating plan.
customer_reviews.author: cooltomcat

customer_reviews.title: Good cookbook with a nice story at the beginning
customer_reviews.text: Good cookbook with a nice story at the beginning. The recipes are very simple and basic which is good for those who aren’t great cooks and are new to keto or just busy in general and don’t have time to cook. If you don’t like cooking but want to eat keto this book is for you!
customer_reviews.author: PJFRESH

customer_reviews.title: Best. Book. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: This book. Wow. First of all, the illustrations are gorgeous and the info is just so spot on and easy to understand. And the recipes! Sooo tasty and easy to make as well. I LOVE that each one has an actual image of what the food is because it just makes it that much easier to assemble/make/etc. I’ve recommended this book to a lot of people so far, and I know one friend got the ebook to give to her mom that had a similar starting story as Suzanne. I can’t wait to see more results from this amazing and surprisingly simple new lifestyle/diet! 10 pounds down in 2.5 weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: While the info on Keto was good, there is nothing special about the recipes. If you do not know how to cook, you will probably like this. The recipes were basic and nothing seemed worth making.
customer_reviews.author: MissKate

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for beginners and veteran Keto lovers alike!
customer_reviews.text: Made my first meal after receiving my book. I made pizza, mint coffee, and snickerdoodle cupcakes! The taste and texture, although still not like our carb loving equivalents, was really quite good. I love that although eggs are key to make many of the dishes “work” that they didn’t taste “eggy”, which is usually the case. Looking forward to trying more, but so far I’m impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect book for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I was scared of keto before getting this book. I wondered how I could possibly survive on 20g CHO. You can! This book is a practical and easy to read. I read the book in one night. The recipes and suggestions are top notch. I looked at similar books and this one has the right about of information combined with recipes and the only thing I am using to get started for the first 30 days. In my first few days I lost 4# and feel good - not bloated anymore. My cravings for sugar has lessened dramatically. The other night at dinner I only ate half of my meal because I was full.
customer_reviews.author: Westdm@182

customer_reviews.title: unrealistic way to eat and live by
customer_reviews.text: Too strict of a diet, no fresh fruit for life? you kidding me? Organic blueberries and strawberries, and apples, are so healthy fro you. Measuring keytones before taking a bite of food is no a way to live.
customer_reviews.author: Clearlake

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Judge a Book By it’s Beautiful Cover!
customer_reviews.text: When I saw this book I disregarded as I assumed it was a skinny beautiful lady telling me how to lose weight. It kept coming up in my feed so I finally read more on it... wow. She lost 120 pounds and was sharing what she personally knew. I bought the book and was so inspired I started the keto lifestyle. I am losing weight and loving the recipes. Best Keto book I own.
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Simply Keto is Super Neato!
customer_reviews.text: I've been following Suzanne on IG for a few years now, and I seriously just love the snot out of her! She's been such a role model for the keto community, and an inspiration to so many. I love how the beginning has cool little household measuring guides, and good substitutions for low carb options for typically high carb items. The recipes are great, and I look forward to trying them out in the future - and each recipe includes a beautifully photographed picture of the recipe... how cool is that? Do yourself a tasty favor, and pick up this book because by far, one of the best recipe books I have in my ever growing collection! <3
customer_reviews.author: Silly Girl

customer_reviews.title: cute book with lots of recipes
customer_reviews.text: I like the book and it was good quality. One of the cons though with this book was there was a lot of recipes that did not apply to everyday life that required a big number of ingredients. It did have good information and is a nice hard back book. I did think that the book would have more recipes for daily life.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Recipes are great if you eat really unhealthy
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this book since I liked all her recipes. Her recipes are delicious and could be great for those who are REALLY unhealthy to start off with. I am moderately overweight but I eat relatively "healthy", meaning I tend to eat more vegetables than anything else. Because her recipes have so much cheese (I rarely eat dairy), I actually gained weight following her suggested menu. Of course the food was delicious, so I still make it from time to time as a treat :)
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, LOVE this book
customer_reviews.text: If you are considering making the Keto lifestyle change, THIS book is the perfect jumping off point. Ms. Ryan's story is compelling. Her recipes are delicious and easy to follow. If you order this book, I suggest getting the Carb Manager App and buying the add on they suggest. Once you get comfortable with Keto, then you can branch out and start buying other books but I definitely suggest starting with this one!
customer_reviews.author: HighPockets

customer_reviews.title: Honestly, the easiest cook book ever!!
customer_reviews.text: If you are considering Keto... BUY THIS BOOK! Seriously the easiest cookbook I have used and I own them all! South Beach, Whole30, Atkins; this book is a blessing instead. Started Keto April1st. Hubs has lost over 20 lbs and I have lost 7lbs (trying to lose 15lbs) The recipes are super easy with normal ingredients and they taste amazing. This book has changed our lives and routine. It’s a Friday night and instead of eating out like normal, I cooked at home! Buy it, stop reading reviews and do it! I’m a wife & mom who was not paid for this review.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Mankin

customer_reviews.title: Overall a Super Resource
customer_reviews.text: There are so many books to choose from and this was the best for me! Suzanne Ryan writes from her own journey with compassion and tips that are extremely useful to get started on your keto journey. Sharing not only recipes that are actually edible and easy to create, to helpful shopping lists to places people actually get groceries from, plus internet resources, and videos, and don't forget a 30 day keto recipe example to use, if your thinking that is best for you! There are so many great features packed into this book - I am so grateful! This busy mom and woman thanks you for making my keto journey easier to begin!
customer_reviews.author: OrTrail

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it for someone who wants something simple
customer_reviews.text: Most recipes are not simple. The reviews said recipes were for one.... And. Many were not. I wished I had returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Jane St. Clair

customer_reviews.title: Great for starting your keto journey
customer_reviews.text: Great narrative about the author's journey into the keto lifestyle. Very helpful for starting my own journey, with clear guidelines on setting up to get the right balance of low carb, high protein ans high fat. I lost 12 pounds in 4 weeks! The recipes are tasty and easy for even a terrible cook (me, I hate cooking) to follow.
customer_reviews.author: ceelavee

customer_reviews.title: Must-have book for Keto dieters
customer_reviews.text: WOW, this book is wonderful. It gives you all the science on Keto, lists of foods, and recipes that are so easy and delicious. And this is coming from someone who likes to eat, but not cook. We have already tried 2 of them already and enjoyed them both. The book is easy to read and understand and has great photos. We have been on Keto for a week now, and this book is inspiring us to keep going.
customer_reviews.author: Regular Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great book
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered a few Keto books. I like this one because, as the title says, it's simple. I found the recipes easy & delicious. Sometimes she leaves out what a serving size is, especially with slow cooker recipes, but I've managed. My hubby & I have been Keto for only 2 weeks but we have become believers.
customer_reviews.author: Sinead Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: A staple for anyone looking to start the keto lifestyle!
customer_reviews.text: After doing all the research in the world I was still struggling on how to get started with a keto lifestyle. I have seen so many books out there and even made the mistake of purchasing "guides" online which were lo literally 5 recipes and didn't teach you how to start. I am such a fan of this book anf have yet to find any recipes I dont like. Even my 7 year is enjoying the recipes. Our favorite is the Bacon Wrapped Cheesy Chicken. It is to die for. I am so grateful for this book and all the information in it. 2 weeks in and I am down 15lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Best Diet Book/Cookbook ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best Diet Book/Cookbook ever! I have never seen such a thoughtful, all-inclusive diet book. Her story and the way she told it is wonderful. I love her. I saw her on Kelly and Ryan and that's why I bought her book. I received it Friday afternoon and began reading it in the evening and the next thing I new, it was nearly midnight. This is the only diet book you'll ever need, especially if you've been struggling all your life, have tried just about everything and nothing has stuck. I have also joined the Keto Karma facebook group and it is quite helpful too, however, I wish that everyone on there bought her book first before entering the discussions.
customer_reviews.author: mkm Savage,MN

customer_reviews.title: Great weight loss plan and well-written, informative book.
customer_reviews.text: This book explains how this diet works---high fats, moderate protein, low carbs. It is difficult to stay on the amount of daily carbs recommended, but cutting them significantly makes a big difference. This is well written, lots of recipes and the author's personal challenge with weight loss. After starting this plan about one week ago, so far I have lost 4# and will try to stick with it until the next 15 are gone. Weight Watchers worked well for me, but constantly having to document what you eat, try to figure out every point...it became a pain, even though it worked well. This method is simpler. Also, it makes you feel fuller longer and feel better mentally---so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Christine M. Glass

customer_reviews.title: Great way to get started on Keto
customer_reviews.text: I had previously stated and failed Keto because I didn't have any real guidance or understanding of it. I decided to try once more, and thought I'd check Amazon for suggestions. Suzanne's book pooped up first and had great reviews so I decided to try it. This helped me learn to really meal plan and actually made me excited to try out her recipes because each one appeared simple and looked great in the pictures. Each recipe I've tried proved to taste great and I've got my son interested in Keto just because of the great food. I've lost 7lbs so far and I look forward to losing more.
customer_reviews.author: A. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great recipes!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a weight loss start and this recipe book did the job! It gave me new recipe ideas and education on how to start and maintain Keto diet. I’ve been doing the keto diet for five months and I’m down 38lbs!! I’m so excited and motivated. Having the recipes and education really helped. Keto isn’t just a diet, it’s a life stile change. That’s the key important thing about this diet. It’s a life style!
customer_reviews.author: TavidS

customer_reviews.title: If you are thinking about starting Keto, this is your book.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a lifestyle change and wanted to lose weight after my baby. This book is it. Keto was confusing for me at first but she makes it so simple and easy to follow. She breaks things down with great illustrations and descriptions. She also has a blog with other helpful information. The food is so good and the recipes are quick and easy to follow. I have lost a total of 20lbs by switching to Keto. My energy levels are great and I feel so much better. Try this book for two weeks.. you won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Bríe

customer_reviews.title: Helpful in so many ways!
customer_reviews.text: I gave up on keto bc meal planning was becoming too stressful for me & I became discouraged when the scale didn’t move. BUT, I discovered this book on amazon and can I just say WOW. Here’s a little looksy lou at what to expect if you purchase this book. There is a meal plan for 30 days, as well as recipes to go along with it. A guide to eating out, and an in-depth scientific explanation on how ketosis works. So here’s to jumping back on the keto train!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: just ok... based on her experience
customer_reviews.text: I received the book and read through it last night. I think its great the author lost so much weight and is healthy now. But this book is based on person experience and not a true keto book. all the recipes are very high in carbs which is surprising since this is a low carb program/lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: I'm thankful she has written her book in a manner that is easy to understand
customer_reviews.text: I am just getting started in reading this well put together book. It appears at this point and time, it is worth every penny I spent. I can certainly relate to the struggle with weight and truly appreciate Suzanne sharing her journey with her readers. I'm thankful she has written her book in a manner that is easy to understand. I have a lot of health issues, one of which makes it very difficult to lose weight, even with diet and exercise. (Dercum's Disease.) I pray that I can have the success with this way of eating as did Suzanne. I feel at this point and time in my life, this is my last resort. Thank you Suzanne!
customer_reviews.author: OIB lady

customer_reviews.title: Quite happy with the diet; the book meh...
customer_reviews.text: The book is okay. The details are going to be found in your own motivation! I used the Carb Manager online program and did very well but there is a lot of unnecessary blather in the book and a few of the recipes (although tasty) aren't what they appear to be in the photos. For instance, I made the personal pizza which should have been 5-6" in diameter and 1/4" thick. The ingredients only made a 3" diameter; 1/8" ( at most) pizza which was hardly worth cooking. If you can borrow this book from someone or the library you will get the idea of the diet but it isn't the greatest despite the lovely photos.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: only returned since there is so much info on the internet.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Arimento

customer_reviews.title: Cream cheese pancakes are like dessert!
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to find a recipe in this book that is not delicious. I just started Keto and already my tummy feels better and I have lost weight. I have to be careful of the pancakes because I can eat a dozen of them at one sitting. It's lucky that I have a co-worker who has been on Keto for a while and he is giving me tips... One key ingredient (nothing to do with the book) recommended by him is Costco's Irish grass fed butter... lick your fingers good! I've tried several meals and I won't bore you with ALL of the successful meals I have made but... Ms. Ryan... you did good! Mahalo
customer_reviews.author: samantha krager

customer_reviews.title: More of a recipe book
customer_reviews.text: Mostly a recipe book , I was looking For complex info about specific foods and diet breakdowns. Great as a recipe book if that’s what your really looking for
customer_reviews.author: Ariadna Ponce Flores

customer_reviews.title: Best Book
customer_reviews.text: Best Keto Book ever. Simple Recipes, very tasty. This is my go to book. Started Keto life style in June 2019 started this 30 day plan and once I got through the Keto flue (yuk) but hang in there, its fine. They give you good info and how to deal with stolls plus. So far down 33 pounds. She suggests good websites and more. Thank you for keeping it simple. Can't say enough good things. My husband says yummy at all meals.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Very informative
customer_reviews.text: I waded through several other Keto books before finding this one. I am so glad I found "Simply Keto!" Suzanne Ryan is informative and personable. she shares her own experience with the diet without harping on her journey, focusing on the Keto lifestyle. She points out how a disciplined approach at the beginning of your Keto journey will help in the weight loss stage instead of jumping straight to "lazy keto," like some of the other books I purchased. In all this seems like a balanced view and I find it very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: H. Lucas

customer_reviews.title: I would have liked more info
customer_reviews.text: Very very simple explanation of keto diet... I would have liked more info... may things are not keto that this book does not tell you about! Had to buy another book! But loved the recipes
customer_reviews.author: Megs513

customer_reviews.title: If you only buy one keto book, make it this one!
customer_reviews.text: I have been eating keto for over a year, and have purchased several books on the subject. Simply Keto is my absolute favorite! Suzanne's story is inspiring, and she is the perfect spokesperson for this lifestyle. I will never go back to eating the standard American diet that was making me fat and sick. My type 2 diabetes has been reversed, and I feel 20 years younger. The recipes in this book are easy, and don't call for a lot of weird ingredients. We love the pancakes! Five stars for Simply Keto!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Davis

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: I just started the Keto Diet a couple of weeks ago and this book has made my meal planning SO easy - mostly because I really like so many of the recipes! The recipes are easy to follow, not very time consuming and genuinely very good. I bought several Keto books in anticipation of starting my diet - this one is absolutely the best. I highly recommend this book!
customer_reviews.author: RDRE

customer_reviews.title: KETO so well explained, meal plans and recipies
customer_reviews.text: This books meets all I want/need and then some. I lost 65 pounds on Atkins 15 years ago. I recall the consistent results and elimination of carb cravings. Having gained 30 back I wanted to compare Atkins with KETO. Keto is nothing new, and is very similar to Atkins, but this book (and Keto) provides a detailed explanation of the program, a bit about why it works, inspirational stories and pictures, great recipes with nutrition information, shopping lists, and a 30-day optional meal plan. I am also looking forward to using the website for ideas and support.
customer_reviews.author: Carol S.

customer_reviews.title: Really Explains Keto
customer_reviews.text: I knew nothing about the Keto lifestyle before purchasing this book. I now know enough to not only get me started, but to keep referring to along the way to reinforce my determination or refresh my knowledge. Even though I won't make many of the recipes, I like having them as back up if I need to. I especially like the pictures that accompany each recipe. Most cookbooks only include a few pictures here and there. I like having everything shown, and they are all well done and appetizing. I consider this a good purchase, whether I succeed or not.
customer_reviews.author: DoggyDoggy

customer_reviews.title: A book I actually use!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought so many cookbooks (of all kinds) and they end up sitting on the shelf, untouched. Why? Because the majority of the dishes inside are things I don't actually want to eat, require far too many ingredients or have obscure shopping lists. This - this is the perfect cookbook taking regular, "normal people" recipes and making them keto friendly. The information and the meal plan is also super great. I have referenced this numerous times already since my purchase a few weeks ago.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS COOKBOOK!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cookbook I have ever used. The recipes are incredibly simple and a lot of them call for the same ingredients which makes shopping easy. I know that it can be a struggle to find GOOD keto recipes that are actually delicious, but this cookbook has changed my entire outlook on eating low carb! Every recipe I have tried has turned out amazing! I also love that every dish has a picture with it which can be hard to find! If you are looking for a great cookbook I would recommend this one a million times over!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Blankenship

customer_reviews.title: My top pick for Keto books.
customer_reviews.text: Just started keto and having her book made it soooooo much easier and nicer. Recipes are good, I've tried many of them. I really like her story and how she delivers the information. She tells you exactly what worked for her, but gives other perspectives as well, with the understanding that everyone is a little different and sometimes you gotta tweak a little to get the max result. She's inspiring, no ego, and is specific. Which is great, because keto is kind of hard!! It's my favorite keto book, and I have many now!
customer_reviews.author: TFrye

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am brand new to KETO and wanted some direction on where to begin. This book is perfect. There are a few short chapters giving some history, the basics and the food lists. Then a TON of awesome looking recipes that look easy to make. I just got it today, so I haven't made anything yet. But I am VERY picky and this is the first book of this kind that I fell in love with instantly. I already have my grocery list ready. One other comment about the author, Suzanne Ryan comes across as very kind, compassionate and humble. I'm so excited to start this lifestyle!
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Best Keto book
customer_reviews.text: I bought this book a couple of months ago but hadn't had a chance to really look at it til recently. It's amazing! Everything you want to know about the Keto diet from someone that has been on it, lost over 100lbs and maintained it as a lifestyle. The author has done all the research and answered all the questions for you. There are meal plans, tastey recipes to satisfy every craving advice, troubleshooting and so much more. I am following it all! If you want a book that covers everything about Keto, get this book!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Basis cookbook
customer_reviews.text: I have been doing a form of Keto off and on since it was called Atkins (about 30 years). It is much healthier now but I am not a beginner. I did not learn too much and found this to be a basic cookbook but it is simple, easy to follow and very healthy. I am happy I bought it! The only thing that I don't like is that there were not a lot of recipes for keto bread, crackers and other unusual items. I can do meat and egg dishes already. There was also only one fat bomb recipe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is BY FAR the absolute best keto cookbook I have found
customer_reviews.text: My husband & I switched to the keto lifestyle in January, so I have bought a number of keto cookbooks in an effort to try and keep some variety in our menu options. This is BY FAR the absolute best keto cookbook I have found. There are pictures for each recipe, the ingredients are all pretty basic, and you don't need to be a chef to make them. My favorite is the recipe for Pop Pop's Peanut Butter Bites, which are absolute HEAVEN! If you're on the fence and don't know which book to buy, look no further -- this is the ONLY keto cookbook you need!
customer_reviews.author: dixiechiken

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous diet
customer_reviews.text: Got violently ill following this diet and had to go to the ER. Eating this much fat nearly burnt a whole in my stomach and esophagus from acid build up. Wish I could get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Fellow Children's Book Author

customer_reviews.title: So much more than a cookbook!
customer_reviews.text: I don't buy cookbooks.... with so many free recipes online, it's definitely not a requirement. But THIS book is so much more and I'm so glad I bought it. Everything you need to know about the keto way-of-eating is in here, without being overwhelming. Suzanne is such a beautiful and genuine person and it shines through this gorgeous book. A perfect balance of honesty, science and realistic lifestyle change suggestions - this book is a great tool to have. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kaelti Butler

customer_reviews.title: Yummy recipes
customer_reviews.text: New to keto. Suzanne breaks it down and explains it great. She even has a website that has a calculator to help you figure out what your intake goals should be. Lots of great recipes to get you started. There’s a 30 day meal plan in the back of the book, I didn’t discover that until after week 1 of starting keto. Most ingredients for recipes are things I already had stocked with the exception of natural sweeteners (such as Swerve). Definitely recommend this book.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: We just bought this book last week and made our first meal tonight (day 1 of the meal plan) picture is of the twice baked cauliflower— it’s seriously amazing!! The book is easy to follow, interesting, bright and cheerful. There are pictures of every recipe as well as pictures on just about every page. She explains what everything is, and makes several product recommendations along the way. Recipes are practical, easy and so far— delicious!! Can’t recommend this book enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: I love this cookbook!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cookbook! My doctor recommended it (he's the author's father) and I bought it immediately. Hubby and I aren't doing a strict keto diet, we're slowly working our way into it. But so far, everything we've made has been delicious and easy to prepare. I love that it's easy to follow and the author emphasizes finding what works for you, not a one-size-fits-all plan. As we slowly transition into this, I'm sure we're going to be making most of the recipes in it. Also love she has suggestions and substitutions for when eating out. That REALLY has helped me a lot with some of my food choices.
customer_reviews.author: Tymber Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Clear and to the point with pictures for each recipe
customer_reviews.text: Great book. Clear and to the point. I am new to keto and this book is just what I needed. It has enough of the science to help you understand how and why the diet works without getting bogged down in a biology lesson. Each recipe has a corresponding picture, which is a must for me with cookbooks. You can literally read the body of this book on one day and be on your way to cooking and starting your keto diet. Handy charts of what foods you can eat and how to replace typical foods with low carb foods (e.g. instead of wheat flour use almond or coconut flour). The title says it all Simply Keto.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous book!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have been doing Keto for awhile, so I know the concept and simply wanted more recipes. I wish I purchased this book when we 1st started because it has EVERYTHING and MORE for someone just starting out. It's the best Keto cookbook I've purchased so far. I probably have 6-8 so far. The recipes have ingredients I'm familiar with and are easy to prepare. Some of my other cookbooks have ingredients I'd never heard of and took longer to prepare. I highly recommend this cookbook to beginnings and pros at Keto.
customer_reviews.author: Schmelle

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I found this approach not to my liking. I think I'd prefer a low carb approach without going to such extremes as Keto.
customer_reviews.author: FJLTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Love this book
customer_reviews.text: Excellent book. Has menu plan and a breakdown for each recipe of the protein, carbs and fat as well as portion size. Explains exactly what you need to know about keto, shopping list and explains macros well. Autor was 289 pounds when she started her keto journey and has documented her experience and what helped her with her weight loss. Would definitely recommend this book.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely useless cookbook I hope I can return it otherwise it’s going in the garbage
customer_reviews.text: The dumbest cookbook I’ve ever read. I don’t need a cookbook to tell me to make a BLT with extra lettuce instead of bread I mean really! There must be 50 recipes for dips I need a cookbook for food so I can eat! not a whole bunch of dips!
customer_reviews.author: john g

customer_reviews.title: This is a MUST Read
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this book! I am just starting Keto and she keeps everything simple and easy to understand. I like that in the beginning she takes a moment to explain the science behind Keto and foods to avoid. Her book is very educationa, so if you are just starting you will find what she has to say very valuable. I also love that she shared her story; I found it to be so relatable. As far as recipes go, she knocks them out of the park. My family is full of picky eaters, but all of her recipes have been a hit. There isn't any that we have tried that we dislike. 10/10 I would buy this book again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Phillippe

customer_reviews.title: STOP LOOKING! This is it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this book because I wanted to get more information about Keto Diet. I didn't know what "Macros' was and how to calculate the carbs, calories, etc... I learned so much from this book. I wanted to start the diet but didn't know how to start, what to eat, what not to eat, etc... The book gives you every little detail that you can imagine. it has her story from day one, the progress, and final results. Also the book has cooking recipes, Shopping list, 1 month meal plan, etc... Now I will be doing my grocery shopping from this book and will start in KETO soon.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Life changing
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough about this book. I've honestly struggled with my weight since middle school about 12 years ago. Ever since then I have only gained weight. I have been attempting numerous diets over the years and have failed every time. I've only had this book a few days but for the first time ever, when I eat I actually feel full!! For once I am not constantly thinking about my next meal and reaching for snacks immediately after eating. This is incredible. I will absolutely update in a few weeks on my own progress but I am very confident, which I have never been before!! Thank you Suzanne Ryan!!
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: So easy to follow, great recipes!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this book based on the recommendation of a youtuber. I wanted something to help me with some more variety and ideas. I just felt like I was drawing a blank on what to eat. When I received this book, I sat down and read through many of the recipes, and then more than once. There were maybe 7 or 8 ingredients I needed from the store to try the majority of them. It's so easy! I'm trying a new one tonight, but so far I've loved all of them. What a life saver to help keep me on track.
customer_reviews.author: HME1975

customer_reviews.title: Good "basic" book if you are starting on keto...
customer_reviews.text: I had already been on keto for some months before discovering this book and "Keto Karma". I think this book is excellent for anyone starting their keto journey. If you've been on it for a bit (as I was) you may find it a bit basic and redundant. But Suzanne the author has lived her journey and is an inspiration for people. And I believe that is what people need to keep going. I use a few of the recipes in the book as well. I def gift it to anyone I knew starting down this path.
customer_reviews.author: doogiesmom

customer_reviews.title: Makes it super easy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good book that makes keto easy... Easy shop, easy to cook, and easy ideas to augment. It's also great how she shares other online resources too. I have been on Keto for four months but wanted a recipe book with pictures to work from. Really happy with the quality, writing, topics, layouts. The picture index in the back is helpful (see my picture of it). Most ingredients are easily kept on hand so I look at the index then know what is for dinner!
customer_reviews.author: The Rev Dr Beth Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Keto On!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this book because I was considering embarking on the Keto lifestyle. After reading Suzanne’s story and guide to Keto success, I decided to give it a try. I’ve made about a dozen of her recipes over the past 5 weeks and I am yet to be disappointed. I’m finding the key to Keto really is variety and her recipes take you beyond avocados, eggs, and salads. The cauliflower casserole recipe is to die for! And her blueberry mug muffin is a staple breakfast in my house. This book is informative, inspirational and a must-have item In your keto arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: Lori J. Church

customer_reviews.title: Clear info on Keto for beginners, delicious, easy to make recipes, and beautiful photos.
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I bought this book! I was getting so bored of eating eggs. (there are only so many ways to make them). This book is filled with easy and delicious Keto friendly meals. I can't wait to try them all. One of my favorite things about this cookbook is that some of the recipes yield one serving.. With just one serving, I'm less likely to overeat. Winner, winner, chicken dinner!
customer_reviews.author: cindisart

customer_reviews.title: This diet is easy and works!
customer_reviews.text: This book laid everything out so clearly and easy to understand. I love that she provides simple recipes, shopping lists, and a breakdown of how to do this diet. I take my list with everything she recommends to buy that I’ll eat, go buy it, and have plenty to eat. I’ve also lost 10 pounds so far and it seemed to just come right off. I even started a new job recently and had 2 coworkers ask if I’ve lost weight since starting. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: To help stick to my keto diet, simplicity is key.
customer_reviews.text: Simply Keto perfectly lives up to its name by providing simple yet delicious keto friendly recipes. I don't have time after work to spend 2 hours cooking a meal for myself and family. Simplicity helps me stick to the keto diet. If I get bored with repetitive foods or sick how much time it takes to make keto meals, I'm at risk for carb binges. With simple recipes I'm able to create something deliciously keto, eat and have the dishes done by 7, so that I have some time to read or watch a couple episodes of the office (for the 10th time lol).
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Litvenenko

customer_reviews.title: More than a cookbook.
customer_reviews.text: I expected a cookbook but got so much more. Suzanne is so open and honest about her journey with weight loss. The book is full of beautiful photos and easy to follow recipes. Her cream cheese pancakes and twice baked cauliflower casserole ate 2 favorites in our family.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Easy, delicious recipes for first time keto-ers
customer_reviews.text: This book has it all, a thorough explanation of the keto diet, foods you can/can’t have, a month of meal plans, access to forums and macro calculators, a detailed explanation of replacement sweeteners, and of course delicious recipes that are do-able. I have lost 25 pounds in 2 months because of this book and am so glad I found it! I’m am getting married soon and this was the best decision I had made so I can look and feel good on my big day!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Life-changing!
customer_reviews.text: This book was recommended to me by an obstetric MD colleague. After reading Suzanne's story and following the easy-to-follow meal plans in the back of the book, I have lost 40 lbs in 6.5 months. More importantly, I have more energy, better mental clarity and feel better than I have in years! I am so thankful for this book recommendation, as it has been a catalyst to change my lifestyle for the better! Thank you Suzanne, for your amazing book! I highly recommend this book for others looking for a lifestyle change.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Simply, It Works
customer_reviews.text: Reviewing this a month and a half after we ordered it. My wife and I have lost a combined 60 pounds. We have tapered off from the rapid loss, but are losing 2-3 pounds a week. No feelings of starvation, great recipes and the support of the App that she suggests has been a game changer. For us, this book has been life changing. If we ever meet her she gets hugs!
customer_reviews.author: Volks Vegan

customer_reviews.title: A seriously practical approach to Keto!
customer_reviews.text: Suzanne Ryan does a great job and simplistically and eloquently explaining what the Keto diet is and how it can work for you. Her recipes are easy to prepare, taste fresh and are delicious. There isn't anything yet that I've tried and haven't liked. What I really love is that Suzanne also had her gall-bladder removed and is proof that you can still eat fat without it. If you want a great intro and practical approach to Keto than this is the book for you.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Marie

customer_reviews.title: Keto cookbook, for anyone!
customer_reviews.text: This book has a lot of simple recipes, that take only a few ingredients. I get no complaints from non keto eaters on any of the meals I have made. If they need a little more flavor, I add more seasoning. You can experiment with a lot of different seasonings to change up the flavors as well. I didn't find the book to be so much crock pot meals, but a variety of cooking methods. Most of the recipes are for serving 1 or 2 people!
customer_reviews.author: Meeeeeeeeeew

customer_reviews.title: The Best Keto Cookbook out there!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been on Keto for a month now and I have been enjoying trying new recipes. My favorite cookbook has been Simply Keto. All the recipes I have tried have been really good. They’ve been big hits with my husband and I. Her recipes work properly unlike another book I had bought. Her instructions are well-written and I have found her recipes accurate so far. I keep on going back to her book time and time again that I went ahead and ordered her new book. Suzanne is my Keto Goddess and I respect her honest, practical advice but most of all her fabulous recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce & Sandra Sharpe

customer_reviews.title: Life changer
customer_reviews.text: This book is a wonderful how to in starting a keto lifestyle. Since reading it a couple months ago and following the eating plan I have lost 26 pounds and feel better than ever! The recipes are excellent, easy and delicious! If you are fed up and need a change get this book and change your life!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Jagosh

customer_reviews.title: Best Keto book out of all the keto cookbooks I've tried!  Light recipes!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had the book for a week and already cooked all my meals and snacks from this book. I can't wait to try more recipes! I've done keto before and used recipes from other cookbooks and Pinterest but these recipes are the best I've ever tried! If you're new to Keto the author gives so much useful information and pantry staples to set you up for success. If you're a keto veteran, you'll love it even more because most of the recipes aren't as heavy as many keto recipes can be. So much outside of just regular-meals-but-remove-the-bread recipes you find elsewhere. Everything is delicious and most are only within 1-2 net carbs!
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cookbook!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t normally write reviews but I feel this cookbook deserves a review. I love the fact that the author tells us about her personal struggles with weight and success with Keto after trying pretty much every other diet. I have had this Keto book for about a week and have made several of the recipes. So far every recipe has been excellent. My favorite is the Sausage Egg and Cheese Casserole. The best news is....I have lost between .5-1 lb daily so far. I’m sure that will level out but it keeps me motivated.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda M. Howell

customer_reviews.title: Great Book
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed this book so much I bought a second one for my niece who was also on the Keto diet to help motivate her as she was getting overwhelmed and frustrated. She really liked it and got her motivation back. Highly Recommend if you are starting out on keto. This story is very inspiring and has great recipes as well.
customer_reviews.author: Cynstrends

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Delicious- GET THIS BOOK!
customer_reviews.text: This book takes such a simple approach to Keto. In a world where we have an over abundance of facts and opinions on everything it's hard to find a book or source you can trust. Suzanne does such a wonderful job in this book. She throws a little bit of opinion in with a whole lot of facts! And that's just the first few pages. The recipes them self are delicious and sooooo simple! I bought the book on a whim without being able to flip through it before hand- BEST DECISION EVER! I can't wait to make it through each recipe!
customer_reviews.author: Llamamama

customer_reviews.title: Easy, simple, fast, tasty!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this book, after checking it out after my library. Looking through the recipes, even those of us with no time can pull off these simply tasty recipes. I haven't even made it to the recipes in the middle of the book because the ones in the beginning looked so tasty! The intro in the beginning on Keto and how to, is great reference and know how. My Boyfriend who isn't doing keto and loves his gluten is eating these tasty meals with me and actually enjoying them.
customer_reviews.author: RRyan

customer_reviews.title: Love this book
customer_reviews.text: Love this book!! My husband & I are new to Keto .. we had never heard if it before until a friend of mine told me about it and this book .. it’s only been 1 week but we are loving it and this booked really helped with all the info we needed to get started. I’ve made 6 of the recipes already and everyone was quick & delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Keto Book Out there
customer_reviews.text: I have been keto/ low carb for about 2 years and with this book finally convinced my mother to try it. Within 3 weeks she had lost 15lbs. This book does a great job explaining the diet and has some amazing recipes. I would HIGHLY recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn A

customer_reviews.title: Amazing cookbook for Keto beginners
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are doing the 30 day plan and the recipes are awesome! Definitely have plenty of staple meals from this one moving forward. The graphics are also wonderful. The only thing missing is a grocery list by week of the meal plan which would have been helpful, but I just took the time to put one together myself. Please do another cookbook with more of your recipes. We love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Food Bible, LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this book is so well written and the food is amazing. I never thought you could feel so satisfied and REALLY lose the cravings & hunger, but it’s all true and this is the best book I’ve ever had. God bless Suzanne, thank you! You will be cooking, but you will love the food and actually learn to like the cooking. It does get easier. Dive in for 1 week and you’ll not turn back!
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Want to KETO?  Order this book now - it may be the only one you'll ever need!
customer_reviews.text: Oh man, I love this book. It explains the KETO plan in plain, understandable terms; has great shopping lists & suggestions on where to find or order some products; actually has recipes that don't require a laundry list of exotic ingredients, AND recipes that are easy to prepare & really, really good! Another friend not doing KETO loves this book because it also fits with her needs to be gluten free. This book is a winner!
customer_reviews.author: WhimZy

customer_reviews.title: Great detailed book, fast shipping!!
customer_reviews.text: This book is more then just about Keto. I’m not done reading through it but the beginning of this book explains all about her journey and life experience. Suzanne is amazing. I’m so grateful for this book. It’s nicely outlined and explained in great detail. I received this book the very next day after ordering. I was expecting at least two day delivery. Nope. Amazon delivered to me in one day. What a great surprise. Thanks Amazon Prime!!
customer_reviews.author: michelle

product_meta.title: Simply Keto: A Practical Approach to Health & Weight Loss, with 100+ Easy Low-Carb Recipes (1)
